name: Time Restriction: Gathering Under Clear Skies
description: 【Time Restriction Quest: Fine Weather】 Listen to the Area Master's story. Gather and deliver the items within the specified conditions.
steps: Gather party members in the camp during "Clear" weather
Inquire details from the requester during "Clear" weather
Obtain <SQDI NUM> <SQDI NAME> at <AREA 19> during "Clear" weather
Deliver <SQDI NUM> <SQDI NAME> to the Area Master
